detailedRequirements:
Challenge Overview

The goal of the challenge is to build an AngularJS/Boostrap plugin that mimic the Amazon AWS Filtering bar functionality.

If you have amazon account, you can login to the above page screenshot as follow :

  • Open http://aws.amazon.com  

  • Use “Sign In To Console” or “AWS Management Console” option from “My Account” drop down to login to the page.

  • After successfully login access EC2 management page (i.e. https://console.aws.amazon.com/ec2/v2/home?region=us-east-1)

  • Or watch this GIF Screencast to see how to get to the search bar.

Challenge Requirements

You will address the following in this challenge :

  • Build AngularJS plugin that is initialized dynamically to listen to text field to enable auto complete and tagging features.

  • You must use Bootstrap for the UI (look and feel) as the default theme for the plugin.

  • We would like the plugin extensible, we need usage API like other plugin (e.g.datepicker) which easy to use. The plugin should at least expose API events/functions when following events happen :

    • On initialization :

      • Allow creating a search bar with set of tags, this is useful when we store the tags in session cookie and user visit the page again, the tags will be populated in search bar.

    • On text field focus :

      • developer will override this function to provide key suggestion list.

    • On key selected :

      • developer will override this function to provide list of value suggestion list based on selected key.

      • The selected key to be passed to this function should be the exact json object item from original suggestion list. i.e. { id : ‘1’, display : ‘field name’, component : list, prefix : ‘Metadata’ }.

    • On text field updated :

      • developer will override this function to receive the tags created in the text field to perform follow up actions (i.e. filtering a table, make call to backend ..etc).

      • The passed information should an array of key/value json object paris of the created key/value tags.

    • The key suggestion list should be in JSON format.

      • Each item in the list should have the following required fields :

        • id

        • prefix

        • component : list, date .. etc. (by default list)

        • display

    • The value suggestion list should be an array of JSON format.

      • Each item in the array should have the following fields :

        • id

        • display

  • List of UI features the plugin should support when interacting with the search bar :

    • Display key suggestion popup

      • GIF screenshot.

      • When text field get focus :

        • Execute “on text field focus” event to get list of suggestions.

        • The result format should follow this file format.

          • It has sections i.e. “Fields” and “Metadata”.

          • Each section has array of keys. Each key is an object with any number of fields, the following fields must be used in the plugin :

            • id : used to as <li> id

            • display : used to display the key in tag

            • prefix (optional) : if provided it is used as prefix for the ‘display’ when add the selected key to the editable text input field.

        • The result will be rendered as auto complete suggestion popup.

          • Sections will be rendered as header for each section in the popup.

          • Section fields will be rendered in a list :

            • “display” field will be rendered as list item text.

            • “id” field will be rendered as list item id.

          • To better understand sections, from GIF screenshot : “Tag Names” and “Resource Attributes” are sections, in sample file it is “Fields” and “Metadata”.

        • The popup content should be scrollable with fixed height.

      • Appearance of key suggestion popup should be toggled by clicking inside the text field.

    • Key suggestion popup filtering.

      • GIF Screenshot.

      • Typing text should filter the popup.

    • Selecting a key from key suggestion popup

      • There are three ways to select a key item from key suggestion popup :

        • Select directly by clicking on key item.

          • GIF Screenshot.

        • Select by using up/down arrows then click “enter” key or “tab” key.

          • GIF Screenshot.

      • When selecting key item from autocomplete popup it will be added to the search text field in format prefix:display :  note that

        • prefix is optional

        • there should be no space between prefix and : character

        • there should be no space between display and first : character

        • there should be a space between display and 2nd : character

        • there should be a space after the 2nd : character

        • This is a regex that matches the rules above : /^((\w+:)?[\w\s]+\s+:\s)/i

    • Display value suggestion popup:

      • GIF Screenshot.

      • The value popup UI component depends on the field type, in this challenge we want to demonstrate one of the following two types  :

        • Drop down list UI component

        • Date picker UI component

        • The solution should be flexible to allow adding new types in future, i.e color picker, time picker ..etc

        • The popups styling should be customizable

      • After key item is selected and added to text field, the plugin should execute event/function to get the value suggestions, the selected key should be passed.

        • The result format if value is drop down list would be this file format.

          • The array of values will be rendered in auto complete popup.

        • If the field type is Date then a Date picker component should be rendered.

          • The result format can be same as the one for drop down but with a single optional value represents the date to select in the datepicker.

          • Use existing bootstrap datepicker component.

    • Selecting a value from a drop down list suggestion popup

      • There are three ways to select a value item from value suggestion popup :

        • Select directly by clicking on item.

          • GIF Screenshot.

        • Select by using up/down arrows then click “enter” key or “tab” key.

          • GIF Screenshot.

      • When selecting value then the text field will be converted into a tag as shown in the GIF screenshots. where ‘display’ field will be used for both key/value to render the tag text, the format should be {key : value}.

      • Clicking on (x) icon remove the tag.

      • Clicking on the tag will change it back to text mode with value selected, and auto suggestion popup filtered for that selected value.

        • GIF Screenshot.

        • For date component the datepicker will be opened with date selected.

        • The key text will be with format (prefix:display : ) as explained above.

      • Value can be entered by free typing, clicking enter or tab keys will change it to tags.

      • When a tag is created then “on text field updated” event/function should be executed, and key suggestion popup should be hidden.

      • Store the tags as key/value array.

      • Key/Value should be unique, so when user try to add another key/value with same values it should not add it as tag.

    • Selecting a value from Datepicker component

      • Image Screenshot

      • The tag will be created same as done for the drop down list value suggestion popup.

      • If user entered invalid date (by free text typing) it should still be accepted, and when user edit, the text will be highlighted and datepicker component will be opened with the default date selected.

    • Value suggestion drop down list popup filtering.

      • GIF Screenshot.

      • Typing value should filter the value popup.

      • You can use this regex to validate that the user is trying to filter a value popup /^((\w+:)?[\w\s]+\s+:[\sa-zA-Z0-9_\s]*)$/i and you can validate that user removed the : character of the key (assuming text is prefix:display : ) by using this regex /^((\w+:)?[\w\s]+\s+:\s*)/i

    • Keyword text without selecting a key

      • GIF Screenshot.

      • A keywords free text can be entered, when clicking “enter” it will add “search :” as key as use the keywords as value.

      • Keywords can have spaces.

      • When creating a json object for this tag, the key will be ‘search’ for both ‘id’ and ‘display’ fields, and the value will be the entered text for the ‘display’ field.

    • Multiple tags :

      • GIF Screenshot.

      • Plugin should allow adding multiple tags.

      • Text field height should be adjusted to fit the tags. When text field lose focus the height should be restored with (+N) appended to the text field to represents number of hidden tags.

 

Javascript

  • Use AngularJS best practices, follow object oriented approach to ensure we can extend the features of the plugin.

  • All JavaScript must not have a copyright by a third party. You are encouraged to use your own scripts, or scripts that are free, publicly available and do not have copyright statements or author recognition requirements anywhere in the code.

  • You must use AngularJS, don’t use JQuery.

Documentation

The library should follow topcoder documentation standards, so library, functions, instance fields, and in-line comments must be provided. Also a standalone document should be provided with following sections :

  • Basic Usage.

  • List of Configuration/Options.

  • Functions.

  • Events.

  • .. etc anything useful for developers.

Demo HTML Page

  • Build HTML page to demonstrate the functionality of the plugin.

  • Add table below the text field to show the events/functions executed/fired based on events occurred in the text field, and what is the input/output for execution.

Browser Compatibility

  • IE9+

  • Latest Google Chrome (Windows & Mac OS)

  • Latest Safari (Windows & Mac OS)

  • Latest Firefox (Windows & Mac OS)

  • iPad (Safari & Chrome)

  • iPhone (Safari & Chrome)
finalSubmissionGuidelines:
Deliverable

  • All source code that address the requirement.

  • Deployment guide document.
